Description: Lowell Therapeutics is a pharmaceutical company that develops products for critically ill patients.
Full Description: Lowell Therapeutics is a pharmaceutical company that develops products for critically ill patients. It develops an anticoagulant for critically ill patients in the ICU who experience kidney failure and need to go on an artificial kidney machine called continuous renal replacement therapy (CRRT), which is 24/7 dialysis. This machine involves circulating blood outside the patient through a filter. Eventually, blood will clot in the filter unless it is anticoagulated. When the filter clogs, doctors and nurses must stop the machine to change it – throwing away clotted blood and in the process, increasing blood loss and the need for transfusions.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Boston Area, East Coast, New England
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Headquarters Location: New York, New York, United States
Description: StreetCred offers accessible data for places people care about.
Full Description: Accessible place data is critical for businesses, consumers, and application developers. Businesses want to be found by new customers, who need to know accurate locations, hours of operation, and other information about the places they want to visit. Application developers need affordable data without onerous legal restrictions or complicated deal terms. Currently, the best place data is very restrictive, expensive, and controlled by a small handful of companies. Quality varies globally, with data concentrated in the biggest markets and poor coverage elsewhere. Even the highest-quality data isn't fresh enough: who hasn't searched online for a store to find it closed or with different hours? Creating and maintaining a dataset like this is a very difficult problem. Restaurants open and close, a store changes hours, a doctor moves her practice across town, or a public building might close for temporary renovations. The StreetCred team has long experience with open mapping software and data and believes the time is right for a high-quality, permanent, decentralized solution to the place data problem. We are developing a protocol that will incentivize the collection and maintenance of data for the places people care about worldwide. To solve this problem, we need to build a system where anyone can freely participate in appropriate incentives. The data must be open and accessible to anyone who wants to use it. And the system must be permanent, not tied to any specific company.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Internet Services, Navigation and Mapping, Other, Software
Top 5 Investors: Bowery Capital, Wonder Ventures, Notation Capital, Studio VC

Description: RedShare is a New York based company that provides a charge-on-the-go service for smartphones. Mobile App/Payment/Media/B2B2C/FinTech
Full Description: We are a New York based smartphone charging solution company. We provide reliable, portable, affordable sharing power banks all over the world by locating our charging stations (kiosks) in different kind of venues (restaurants, karaokes, nightclubs, bars, etc). Our main business model is collecting revenue from powerbank rentals. Customers can use our App or WeChat to scan the QR code on the kiosks and rent a portable powerbank. The renting price differs among venues. At present, we charge customer $1 for restaurants and $2 for karaokes & nightclubs in New York (Maximum $10 per day). Also, we will profit from advertising business (kiosks, social media and app) in future since we are the first company in shared powerbank industry that has a screen on the kiosks. Our operating areas now cover New York City, Boston, Los Angeles, Las Vegas, Vancouver and Sydney. Our business is trying to solve the problem that phones are becoming necessary to everyone and people nowadays easily run out of phone battery. We will provide such kind of service that makes customers no longer get anxious about low battery phones. We have more than 15 competitors all around the world now. Most of them are in East Asia/South East Asia since that’s the origin of this type of business and all the products are manufactured there. Except competitors in the US, all other competitors have a similar business model to ours. Some of them got huge investment such as Enmonster/Laidian/Xiaodian in China and ChargeSpot in Hongkong/Japan. Competitors in the US are running a different kind of business model by selling charger or locating phone in a secured box to charge, which is not prevalent in leading market. Our clients can be separated into Consumers and Business entities. For consumers, we targeted on those people who would easily running out of phone battery. According to our research, most phones can only last for less than 8 hours after a one-time charge, which means most people have a demand of charger in the evening. For business entities, we targeted on those venues who want to have extra income and better customer service since we will share the revenue with our partner venues. Companies who want to advertise on our screen are our clients as well. Our current operating status is that we have existing product and service. After 4 months’ operation from March 2019, we find the business model works pretty good in the US market and we are even more profitable than Asian companies since our breakeven time for our kiosks (2 weeks for top venues and 6 month for restaurants) is way shorter than that in Asian market. Therefore, we try to expand the business into US market as soon as possible with around $7 million investment to get more market share.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Apps, Consumer Electronics, Hardware, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Other, Software
Founders: Hao Zhang, Pengqian Ma, Quanda Wan, Yi Huang, Ze Yu

Unfortunately, most e-tailers are uncompetitive in "converting customers" because they have limited IT resources, insufficient know-how and small datasets. As a result, Brands with $50M-$1B in sales are missing out on $300 Billion in lost sales opportunities. Glov innovated AI-supervised mini-robots that predict a buyer's intent with just a few clicks and customize the product details, user interface, and copy in real-time, making it a first-of-its-kind product in the market. The mini-robots also learn from a large data pool by experimenting with multiple clients at the same time, which solves the cold-start problem and quickly delivers results. Glov is a team of Stanford graduates, Case Western PhDs, and AI Unicorn alums on their way to enabling millions of people with shopping innovations across all eCommerce touchpoints.

Description: Refr Sports provides a gig economy marketplace to the sports referee industry
Full Description: Refr Sports is developing a platform solution to fix inefficiencies and shortages in the United States referee marketplace by bringing new generation technologies and employees to the industry. Sports referees currently rely on antiquated third-party referee schedulers to provide them with games to work. Similarly, sports organizations rely on the same referee schedulers to provide referees that are qualified to officiate their games. This approach has not been updated in decades as the referee industry continues to use outdated technologies and employment methods. The result has been a severe drop in the supply of referees while at the same time demand has increased. Our application, Refr Sports, will modernize the current system, providing referees and sports coordinators an efficient and effective tool for completing their respective duties. Refr Sports makes this a reality by offering a mobile application that supports both referees and sports organizers as end users. Our app delivers complete freedom to the users by allowing the sports organizations to post their game schedules along with officiating needs and offered compensation for each game. Referees can then see the ‘work order’, accept it, and be paid immediately after the game. The Refr platform makes money by taking a small service and processing fee on the payments we facilitate through the app. This business model is very similar to what has been successful in the food (DoorDash), transportation (Uber) and personal care (care.com) industries. Our Refr Team, made up of business, technical and sporting experience, has set out on a mission to create the platform that will turn the referee industry into a gig economy marketplace. The world has seen this successfully materialize in many industries already and the referee industry can be next, by making it easy to post opportunities, claim opportunities, and get paid.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Minneapolis-Saint Paul Area, Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Software, Sports

Description: MS Pen Technologies specializes in the application of the MasSpec Pen, a novel probe which enables real-time biochemical analysis.
Full Description: The MasSpec Pen is a handheld pen-like device that rapidly identifies the molecular profile of tissues using a small volume water droplet and mass spectrometry analysis. After 3 seconds of gentle physical contact with a tissue surface, the water droplet is transported to a mass spectrometer, which characterizes diagnostic proteins, lipids, and metabolites. Using machine learning algorithm, a diagnosis is provided with an associate probability of presence of cancer. The pen could be used to rapidly distinguish tumor from healthy tissue during surgery in mice, without requiring specific labeling or imaging and without evidence of tissue destruction. President and CEO: Shannon D. Green

Description: Appsta is a marketplace where buyers and vendors can safely conduct business. Get instant quotes & a code quality guarantee!
Full Description: Appsta is a global marketplace that brings together people needing technical services and agencies selling them.  Through a FULLY AUTOMATED process, the estimate for the project is formed, and the prospective buyer can compare bids from vendors all over the world.  They can filter down to their ideal vendor and then engage with tech consultants on the app in real time to get their feedback on the project plan.  When they feel confident with the project outline, they can compare bids and contracts from multiple vendors - still without interacting with a single salesperson.  If desired, these buyers can reach out at any time to the agencies they're comparing. When ready, they can sign a scope of work based on their project bid, then send a down payment into escrow, and book a kick-off meeting - all from the comfort of the platform. Appsta provides transparency, accountability, code quality guarantees, and concierge support so that first-time nontechnical founders have the leverage they need to succeed.  Founders, business owners and enterprise IT teams can confidently hire from a highly vetted pool of tech agencies and other vendors, comparing agencies around the world in just a few clicks. This startup was born out of the desire to help non-technical founders connect with fractional CTOs and top-shelf tech teams, while also meeting the demand agencies have for streamlining their overhead and sales processes.

The general consensus is that recommendations from friends rule. The problem is, getting those recommendations from friends in the normal course of life (via text, chance encounters, or planned social events) is no small task. Description: leveraging biotech to improve, protect, and restore ecosystem balance
Full Description: Environmental Quality Operations, EQO, was founded to bring the modern molecular biology laboratory to the field of environmental management. With their first line of services and automated sampling products, EQO aims to detect, monitor, and eradicate invasive species by utilizing over a decade’s experience in bioengineering, diagnostic development, and experimental therapeutic development. Environmental Quality Operations next generation detection services are built to provide targeted, highly sensitive, assays that allow for the earliest possible detection and robust analytics to determine the scope and location of nuisance species. In addition to best in class sensitivity and specificity, through analysis of various biomarkers, EQO services can determine population activity, life cycle, and dynamics. Environmental Quality Operations offers a first of its kind automated sampling platform, which can be installed at critical resources at risk of mussel infestation. Sampling occurs at programmable intervals and are stored in the device. When analysis is desired, simply send the sampling vessels to EQO and get results within days of receipt. In addition to their detection and monitoring services, EQO R&D is actively pursuing targeted biopesticide systems to eradicate invasives while avoiding off-target impacts, saving money on downstream remediation efforts and protecting the native environment.
Headquarters Regions: Southern US
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Professional Services, Science and Engineering

Description: Infrastructure to build, manage & run useful autonomous AI agents
Full Description: Open-source framework for developers designed to Build, deploy, and manage Autonomous AI Agents. Features include: - Agent provisioning and execution offer the ability to run multiple agents concurrently for maximum efficiency. Developers can expand these agents' capabilities by using a growing library of tools or by creating custom tools tailored to their needs. - The platform includes a graphical user interface (GUI) for easy management and interaction with agents. For direct input and permissions management, an action console is provided. SuperAGI supports multiple Vector DB connections, which improves agent performance and data access. - Create multi-model agents that can be tailored to specific tasks. This is enhanced further by agent trajectory fine-tuning, in which agents learn and optimise their performance via feedback loops. - Performance telemetry provides useful insights into agent performance, allowing for optimisation and improvement. The platform also emphasises effective token management, balancing the costs associated with its use. - SuperAGI enables agents to store their experiences, thereby facilitating continuous learning and adaptation. To prevent looping issues, it employs looping detection heuristics that notify developers when an agent is stuck, enabling proactive resolution. - A resource manager is included for the handling of files generated by agents, ensuring efficient data management and analysis.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Philadelphia Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Software

Description: MetaMirror is a DID company that’s unlocking the power of personal data for everyone
Full Description: "MetaMirror is a company specializing in Decentralized Identity (DID), focused on empowering individuals with control over their personal data. Our solution utilizes the privacy-preserving blockchain infrastructure of Oasis Network to facilitate ethical data monetization, ensuring the privacy of users. Our process begins with users tokenizing their Web2 and Web3 data into confidential personal data assets. These assets are then managed by a smart DID, known as AI Buddy. By analyzing the user's identity properties, such as demographics and preferences, AI Buddy identifies earning opportunities, such as paid ads and surveys, and offers data-driven services to generate income for the user."

True Flood Risk delivers real-time flood risk intelligence & actionable insights for insurers, financial services, emergency response and floodplain managers including: Property-level first-floor height (FFH) / lowest floor elevation data Real-time flood monitoring and early warning system to identify properties at risk Visualization tools such as flash & river flooding simulations Identify flood risk hotspots within communities, social vulnerability insights Estimate flood insurance premiums, expected claims losses and replacement costs Property-level & community flood risk assessments to quantify flood-related exposures and produce actionable mitigation alternatives Custom reports and outreach to communicate flood risk to property stakeholders PDF parsing: Document data extraction to analyze current & expired ECs in digital form

Description: SaaS Company Building Next Generation Privacy-Preserving Technologies.
Full Description: Nth Party’s “collaboration without sharing” software enables secure, confidential computation over data without ever creating a central database of proprietary or sensitive information, creating an opportunity for workflows where PII can never be leaked between internal teams or to external companies. Nth Party leverages Multi-Party Computation (MPC), a technology that has introduced opportunities to reduce or eliminate the need to handle or store sensitive data. MPC is based on theories that emerged in the 1980s, based on the idea that parties may jointly compute a function over their inputs while keeping those inputs private. There is huge value across the Healthcare/FinTech/MarTech ecosystems and it upends existing business models.

Description: Roboair is a technology company developing a next generation traveler centric travel platform that offers cheap flights, stays & car rentals
Full Description: Roboair is a technology company developing a next generation traveler centric travel platform that offers cheap flights, stays & car rentals worldwide. Roboair Inc., is an online American Travel Services Company and metasearch engine headquartered in Palo Alto, California. It was founded in 2018 to build a traveler centric decentralized platform to empower travelers to interact directly with suppliers with the aim to create efficiency in the travel industry by way of eliminating the third parties and minimizing the cost of transactions both for suppliers and travellers. Roboair is already providing the cheapest booking prices to its members in the world for flights, car rentals and hotel bookings. Roboair is providing 5% cash back on airline booking prices, 20% cash back on hotel booking prices, 10% cash back on car rental companies booking prices to its members via Robo App  - www.roboair.com/appstore - . Robo App is built on  Roboair's own algorithm that provides the best booking deals regardless of the location of the traveler and global commercial sourcing backbone. Roboair Inc. is a privately funded company. Today, Roboair provides 500+ airlines and more than 200.000 hotels comparable cheapest fares with Roboair’s Global Price Matching Algorithm regardless of the location of the traveler. And this is just the beginning! With Roboair building its next generation travel centric decentralized travel marketplace engine and intelligent traveler assistant Robo www.roboair.com/appstore , Roboair is to evolve and disrupt the current travel planning process globally. Services accessible, affordable, comparable and tailor-made for every single traveler, ultimately accelerating the advent of a smart and harmonious journey. Compared flight fares and several services needed for traveler’s journey already exist independently, but when combined, localized and decentralized, they serve the ultimate purpose – that’s the future we aim for. Roboair is set to grow and provide next generation consumer solutions to travelers globally. Upcoming blockchain integration aims to unlock access to DeFi markets, pioneering a new era of financial interaction within the travel industry. Our leading growth drivers will be intelligent technologies, product innovation, customer loyalty and global expansion.

Description: GloComX uses NFTs to enable fractional real estate investment via blockchain.
Full Description: GloComX  aims to create a platform that allows fractional real estate investment using non-fungible tokens (NFTs) as security. Our platform will leverage blockchain technology to create a more accessible and efficient way to invest in real estate. We will also introduce a utility token that can be used to purchase the security tokens on our platform. The real estate market has always been a popular investment option, but it's not always accessible to everyone due to high costs and limited options for fractional investment. The rise of blockchain technology and NFTs has opened up new possibilities for fractional ownership of real estate, which is an untapped market with great potential. Our platform will target both experienced and novice investors who are interested in diversifying their investment portfolios and benefiting from the steady growth of the real estate market. GloComX platform will operate as a marketplace that allows property owners to tokenize their real estate assets and sell fractional ownership to investors. We will create security tokens that represent a portion of the property and can be traded on our platform. The security tokens will be backed by the actual real estate asset, and the investors will have ownership rights to the portion of the property represented by the tokens. GloComX  will also introduce a utility token that can be used to purchase the security tokens on our platform. The utility token will have multiple functions, including access to exclusive investment opportunities, discounts on transaction fees, and governance rights on the platform. This dual-token model will create a self-sustaining ecosystem that incentivizes users to hold and use GloComX utility token. GloComX platform aims to revolutionize the real estate market by introducing a more accessible and efficient way to invest in real estate through fractional ownership using NFTs as security. With our innovative dual-token model and focus on user experience, we aim to become a leading player in the fractional real estate investment market.
Headquarters Regions: Western US
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Other, Payments, Software

Return Home is a service that offers end-of-life care by delicately converting the human body into soil following death. Terramation transforms human remains into nutrient-rich soil, fostering the growth of new life and contributing to the development of vibrant ecosystems.

Description: Profit Matters is a Plano based (suburb of Dallas Fort Worth) based accounting bookkeeping service provider.
Full Description: Profit Matters is a Plano based (suburb of Dallas Fort Worth) based accounting bookkeeping service provider that ensures your financial statements are accurate every single month, so you have the tools necessary to make better business decisions. We assign a single point of contact to your small business. Our team enters your transactions every month, records month end adjustments, reconciles all accounts, and provides you the reports you need. If you need more than that, we offer two plans that will give you a part-time accountant or CFO who can help you navigate the financial challenges of your business. We service Construction HOAs Sharing Economy Uber Real Estate Agent Investor Multi-Family Manufacturing Medical Dental Professional Services Software IT Managed Services SaaS Non-Profit Church Restaurant businesses.  We work with QuickBooks Online, Restaurant 365, Xero, Sage Intacct, FreshBooks, AppFolio, Buildium, RealPage, Yardi, ViewPoint, Foundations, Sage Timberline, Primavera, Netsuite, Dynamics and SAP. Our service industries are as below:  • Construction & Custom Home Builders • Homeowners Association (HOA)  • Sharing Economy • Real Estate • Manufacturing Companies • Medical and Dental • Professional Services • SaaS Software • Non Profit Organizations • Restaurant Owners                                                                                                                                                                                 At Profit Matters, we focus on accurate bookkeeping hence we assign a dedicated account manager to your company that you will work with exclusively. That account manager has an entire team of people working for them to accomplish all of your goals and meet your expectations. We achieve accuracy by constantly investing in process improvements, training and technology tools using robotic process automation, machine learning, and artificial intelligence (AI) . The top benefits of working with us: -    A dedicated Account Manager for your company at no extra cost -    No exchange of emails instead will be using a communication tool to provide full transparency -    You will receive monthly reports by the 10th business day of each month -    Get consultation on reports, budgets, etc. on per hour basis. Hence making it cost-effective -    We have three affordable bookkeeping plans -    You can add al la carte services to your monthly subscription too, so you can opt for Customized plans as per your requirements. -    Upgrade, downgrade, or cancel any time.

Description: Golden Eagle Lending offers services to simplify finances, especially by consolidating debt into a single, fixed rate loan.
Full Description: Streamlining your financial life is more straightforward with Golden Eagle Lending's services. We specialize in debt consolidation loans, giving you the ability to merge several high-interest credit card debts into one loan with a lower interest rate. This process not only simplifies your monthly payments but also could save you money on interest over time. For those wondering about the legitimacy of Golden Eagle Lending, it presents itself as a credible provider of debt consolidation services. By focusing on credit card consolidation, Golden Eagle Lending aims to help customers navigate their financial obligations with greater ease and efficiency. Their approach is about offering a helping hand to those who feel overwhelmed by their debts, allowing for a more manageable financial situation. As with any financial service, it's important to do your due diligence. Description: EternaTear is developing a next-generation therapy for the over-the-counter dry eye market.
Full Description: EternaTear is developing a next-generation therapy for the over-the-counter dry eye market. Dry eye is the inability of the tear film and lids to protect the surface of the eye, resulting in itching, burning, and pain. With a dozen or more underlying causes, dry eye is notoriously difficult to diagnose and treat, and if left untreated, it can lead to permanent corneal damage. Patients with even moderate dry eye can suffer from debilitating symptoms that lead to a drastically reduced quality of life. Current treatment options are limited, and most patients rely on over-the-counter eye drops for temporary relief. But because they neither treat the root cause nor appropriately address the symptoms, current products on the market fail to provide adequate relief and must be reapplied as often as 6-12 times every day. By pairing proven technologies with pioneering research, EternaTear™ is developing a product that is closest to natural tears. Using a previously unrecognized mechanism, EternaTear™ can remain on the eye for an extended period of time, reducing the number of applications per day and giving Dry Eye patients lasting relief.

Industries: Aerospace, Developer Tools, Internet, Internet of Things, Mobile, Security, Semiconductor, Software, Telecommunications, Wearables
Description: Hex Five is the creator of MultiZone® Security, the quick and safe way to build high-grade security firmware for embedded systems.
Full Description: HEX-Five is the creator of MultiZone® Security, the quick and safe way to build high-grade security firmware for embedded systems. For semiconductor companies and electronic device manufactures with stringent requirements in terms of safety and security, Hex Five’s Trusted Firmware provides secure boot, device attestation, remote firmware updates, telemetry, real-time monitoring, and scalable secure communications. Unlike traditional firmware, which is built as a monolithic blob of trusted and untrusted functionality, Hex Five’s Trusted Firmware is completely self-contained and isolated from the rest of the system thanks to the underlying Hex Five’s patented MultiZone® TEE technology. With Hex Five, companies throughout the semiconductor value chain benefit from stronger security, reduced development costs, times and risks, and the flexibility to safely integrate readily available multi-sourced hardware and software components. PATENTED TECHNOLOGY Securing embedded devices has become increasingly difficult as complex new requirements are often met with the addition of readily available 3 rd party components that cannot always be trusted. Most embedded devices lack the hardware resources to provide the necessary separation, thus leading to larger attack surface and increased system vulnerability. To shield critical functionality from untrusted third-party components, Hex Five has designed, developed, and patented MultiZone® Security, a truly innovative Trusted Execution Environment providing hardware-enforced software-defined separation of multiple functional domains within the same chip. Complexity is the enemy of security. To simplify the development process, and to minimize the risk for human error, MultiZone encapsulates and hides the complexity of managing the underlying hardware security blocks exposing their functionality as a set of policies. The only interaction between the developer and Hex Five’s Trusted Execution Environment is a simple policy definition file. No security expertise is necessary and no coding is required – or in fact even allowed.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Consumer Electronics, Hardware, Internet Services, Mobile, Privacy and Security, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: INK Games is a technology startups that creates virtual playground for gamers, social influencers, and online users.
Full Description: INK Games is the ONLY platform with a viral tracking and payment engine that will connect millions of people together globally, allowing players to perpetually participate in the revenues that flow through their personal invites, connections, and viral reach. The INK Games Platform is creating the future of how players participate in the leisure economy by allowing them, for the first time ever, to track and monetize their global connectivity and viral reach – in perpetuity.   The INK Platform allows creators, influencers, players, in fact anyone with a smartphone, to earn revenue and get paid for their following, right from their phone.  For influencers, this means no more one-time payments from brands, no more turning one’s entire following over to brands through one-off campaigns.  It’s our vision to connect the world through INK IDs (user handles), and pay all users on the revenues that flow through their global connectivity, day-in and day-out…perpetually. Core to the INK Platform is the Company’s proprietary payment and tracking engine, which dynamically maps each user’s global viral audience, algorithmically converts platform engagement into an Impact Score, then pays users perpetually on their score.  This is a big moment for the gaming industry.  This proprietary technology is sorely needed as we transition into a new era of community economics in gaming. An award-winning group of gaming visionaries and development experts from EA, Zynga, SciPlay, and Buffalo Studios, the INK Games team has a track record of scaling mass-market franchises and achieving exceptional outcomes for investors and shareholders. The team has made significant technological advances in developing the INK platform, which will shift power from major marketing gatekeepers back to creators, influencers, players, and game developers.

Description: For kids, by kids online community and content marketplace for student-directed learning
Full Description: Tract is the first for kids, by kids online community for student-directed learning. We are reimagining education by giving kids full control and making learning fun. We offer members (kids age 8+) unlimited on-demand courses (learning paths) and vibrant weekly live events, taught by our inspiring community of accomplished creators. Together, they enable kids to develop passions through meaningful, real-world lessons giving them the skills and mindset to address 21st-century challenges and opportunities. Tract is based on TRICK, the philosophy pioneered by our co-founder Esther Wojcicki. Esther has positively impacted the lives of thousands of children from her award-winning student-run journalism program and is a mother of three successful women (CEO of YouTube, CEO, and founder of 23andMe, and top UCSF medical researcher) all by applying TRICK. TRICK stands for Trust, Respect, Independence, Collaboration, and Kindness. These five pillars are at the core of Tract and our mission to empower all kids to become tomorrow's innovators, leaders, and global citizens. Our team is unified by Esther’s lifelong work to evolve education for the 21st century and comes from top Consumer and Education Technology companies (Uber, Microsoft, and Instracture). What We Believe: - The secret to getting kids interested in learning is giving them control - Kids are much smarter and capable than most people think - Successful people believe in themselves and aren’t afraid to take risks - Creative people with great passions don’t follow the rules - Current rates of depression and lack of career-readiness is a global epidemic - Our education system of standardization and obedience limits creativity and a growth mindset - Education is not equitable and the achievement gap is widening - We need a generation of community-minded global citizens to make the world a better place - Education that works for kids, not against them is the silver bullet for the world’s problems

Description: Biotech startup helping parents navigate food allergies through an at-home breastmilk allergen detection strip.
Full Description: An over-the-counter allergen test that identifies various food proteins in breast milk.  The users are both breastfeeding mothers who suspect infant food allergy/intolerance as well as breastfeeding mothers who wish to deliberately introduce food allergens to their infant early and often as recommended by the AAP.  These women understand and appreciate the benefits of nursing as the healthiest, natural form of infant nutrition.   This will be the first product to allow mothers, pediatricians, and lactation consultants the ability to evaluate human milk for allergens in real time.  These users will be supported with the Free to Feed app.  Mothers will annotate which allergens are present in addition to the date and time of milk expression and nursing/feed.  Parents can also record any symptoms which will allow correlative and comprehensive data to assist medical professionals in determining the culprit.  This data will be compiled in a summary page which can be shared with medical professionals. The number of reported food intolerance symptoms has spiked, and our understanding of early immune development is subsequently evolving.  Converse to previous recommendations to avoid early top food allergen introduction, recent studies have shown early and sustained introduction to the infant diet may influence the risk of allergic or autoimmune disease for those patients who do not already exhibit allergic symptoms before one year of age.  A meta-analysis of 146 studies concluded that early introduction was associated with a moderately lower risk of developing egg or peanut allergy.  This has shifted the AAP peanut and egg recommendations without providing mothers with the tools to effectively introduce.
Headquarters Regions: Research Triangle, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Health Care

Description: At Home Diagnostics enabling remote drug and alcohol testing.
Full Description: ShareTek is an innovative at home diagnostics company that provides remote drug and alcohol testing products without sacrificing quality in the testing results.   Based in Scottsdale, AZ, ShareTek was founded in 2019 by a close-knit team of professionals who have deep personal connections to addiction, illness, crime, and redemption.  Steve Moak, CEO and Founder created the company after his personal journey with addiction. When he walked out of a treatment facility seven years ago, he realized there needed to be a new model of care.  He saw the lack of access and tools for supporting people early in recovery had not been updated in decades.   “I wanted to make testing more discrete,” said Moak. “We invented the first at home DNA confirmed drug test kit which reliably detects over 100 different substances, including designer drugs, benzodiazepines, antidepressants, nicotine and even synthetic urine that would otherwise go undetected by traditional tests. The state-of-the-art drug and alcohol testing solution leverages DNA matching technology to validate at home test results by matching  DNA from saliva and urine” “Our goal is to eliminate observed collection from the drug and alcohol testing industry.  It’s stigmatizing and retraumatizing for many clients.  One day I think we will look back and wonder why this was ever an acceptable practice.” ShareTek’ s rapid growth was boosted with the rise of at home services due to Covid and is now the largest provider of DNA confirmed at home drug tests in the nation.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Phoenix Area, Western US
Industry Groups: Health Care

Description: Ziotag is an AI-powered accessible video platform for all, including people with vision, hearing, ADHD and learning disabilities.
Full Description: Ziotag is an AI-powered accessible video platform for all including people with vision, hearing and learning disabilities.  It makes discovering, searching and navigating video and audio content a seamless experience.  When coupled with assistive technology like screen readers, it is a game changer for people with disabilities.  To make any video accessible, the user copies and pastes the URL of any online video (or audio) and Ziotag will use its deep tech AI engines to automatically generate transcripts, extract the thoughts, ideas and concepts of the content and create an easy to navigate Actionable Table of Contents (AToC).  Now every word, thought, idea and concept of the video is fully searchable with results showing up as a clickable timestamp to the moment of that search phrase. Every segment of your entire video library is now properly indexed and organized. Viewers can search your video gallery or skim the AToC of specific videos to find the topics that are most relevant for them and stay engaged longer because they are consuming exactly what they’re interested in, and interacting with it. This is an absolute game-changer for students, teachers, researchers and knowledge workers.  It helps promote engagement for video podcasters, event producers, online courses, learning and development professionals, content marketers, webinar hosts, and anyone else publishing or watching videos.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Education, Information Technology, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Software, Video
Founders: Jeffrey Paul, Michael Puscar, Steve Durham, Todd Giannattasio

Description: NDB is a nanotechnology company established to develop and manufacture semiconductors, energy, and battery solutions.
Full Description: NDB is headquartered in San Francisco, California. The Corporation was formed to develop and manufacture semiconductors, energy, and battery solutions. NDB develops innovative clean energy generators and storage systems with a simplified and innovative design optimized to produce economical and pollutant-free electricity, namely the novel NDB Cell, NDB Chantico, NDB Volta, and DEP (Decentralized Energy Platform). NDB Cell, NDB Volta, and NDB Chantico are all closed-loop energy systems for low and high-power applications that redefine and revolutionize the battery and energy-generating systems as we know them. NDB Cell is a radioisotope electric generator (REG) device that can provide clean energy to power numerous applications over their entire lifespan and overcome the limitations of the existing energy generation/distribution solutions.  NDB Chantico is a high-efficiency radioisotope thermoelectric generator (RTG) that uses nuclear waste sources. It is based on the heat generated by radioactive decay of the radioisotope and converting it into electricity using the thermoelectric converter. NDB Chantico’s heat source consists of different radioisotope compositions mainly processed from nuclear waste. NDB Volta is a compact and modular smart microreactor that will lead the future of small and portable power generation technology. NDB optimizes a new smart core design that will combine small size and high energy density features based on a fission heat source. NDB is developing new multiphase semiconductors and encapsulation techniques for multiphase power sources. DEP is a decentralized energy platform incorporating several novel functionalities, energy sharing, and trading with Volt token, a live payment instrument for the energy produced by NDB or other utility providers.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Energy, Science and Engineering, Sustainability

Industries: Biotechnology, Health Care, Hospital, Life Science, Medical, Medical Device
Headquarters Location: New York, New York, United States
Description: Medical technology startup company specializing in large bore vascular closure following transcatheter cardiovascular therapies
Full Description: Venock Inc. is MedTech startup with headquarters in New York City and operations in Munich, Germany.  The company is specializing in vascular closure of very large bore access sites (>8 mm) from transcatheter cardiovascular therapies.   Currently the company is focusing on large bore VENOUS closure.  Both because this is a currently unmet need in the industry with a >$2B market, and because this is a much more straightforward path to commercialization in terms of regulatory clinical studies.    However, Venock's fundamental principle of closure is effective on large bore access sites in BOTH veins and arteries.   The current method of closing such venous access sites is manual compression, which is time consuming, costly, a drain on hospital resources, and results in considerable amount of patient discomfort.   The Venock system will attain full closure in 1 minute.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Founders: Marcus Irsfeld, Terry Barnes, Volker Berl, Wolfgang Goetz
